sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { getBlocksHeight } from "../../api"; import Nav from "../nav"; export default function BlockPage() { const [data, setData] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const query = window.location.pathname.substring(8); const fetchData = async () => { const res = await getBlocksHeight(query); setData(res.data); }; fetchData(); }, []); console.log(data); return (
{data && (

Block {`#${data.height}`}

{`Height：${data.height}`}

{`Age：${data.timestamp}`}

{`Transactions：${data.txns}`}

{`Block Miner：${data.miner}`}

{`Block Rewards：${data.reward}`}

{`Difficulty：${data.difficulty}`}

{`Total Difficulty：`}

{`Size：${data.size}`}

{`Gas Limit：${data.gasLimit}`}

{`Parent Hash：${data.parentHash}`}

{`Hash：${data.height}`}

)} {/* {data && (

{data.timestamp}

{data.miner}

{data.hash}

{data.difficulty}

{data.gasLimit}

)} */}
); }
